bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of lou 瘺 , fistula, with swellings appearing at random locations, eventually opening to develop into festering fistula. In former times it was believed that after having ingested medication to cure sparrow fistula, one would discharge with one’s urine items resembling sparrow eggs, or with one’s feces items resembling sparrows. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 34: 此由居處飲食有雀毒氣，入於臟，流於脈，發無定 處，腫，因潰成瘺，服藥，有物隨小便出，狀如雀卵，故謂之雀瘺 , “This is because poisonous qi of sparrows encountered at one’s living place, in beverages and food, has entered the depots whence it has flown into the vessels. It does not effuse at fixed locations. The swelling later begins to fester and develops into fistula. Having ingested medication, [patients] will release with their urine items resembling sparrow eggs. Hence one calls this ‘ sparrow fistula ’”.
